project.name: Poseidon Networking
project.scope: Zero-trust networking, mTLS, service mesh policy

sections.title: Current State of Poseidon Networking
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee's understanding of the current zero-trust and mTLS setup in production
sample_questions: Walk me through the current mTLS policy enforcement in Poseidon Networking.
How do you validate compliance with POL-SEC-001 Least Privilege & JIT Access in the service mesh?
What are the key metrics you monitor to ensure SLA-ORI-02-like latency targets are met in Poseidon?

sections.title: Incident Handling & Runbooks
sections.goal: Explore operational readiness and runbook-driven response
sample_questions: Describe the last incident where RB-NET-029 Cert Rotation Checklist was used.
How do you coordinate with other teams during a certificate expiry-related outage?
What unwritten heuristics do you apply when deciding to trigger RB-DR-001 Regional Failover Procedure in a networking context?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify multi-hop dependencies between networking and other subsystems
sample_questions: How does Poseidon's mTLS policy interact with Orion Edge Gateway's MTLS handshake logic (GW-4821)?
Can you detail a scenario where changes in Nimbus Observability's tracing impacted your incident triage in Poseidon?
How do you ensure Borealis ETL traffic maintains compliance through Poseidon's zero-trust policies?

sections.title: Risk Assessment & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Probe understanding of risks, tradeoffs, and decision-making with evidence
sample_questions: What are the main risks of tightening mTLS policies further, and how do you weigh them against potential latency impacts?
Describe a time you had to choose between SLA breach and security posture degradation—what evidence did you use?
If an RFC like RFC-1618 mTLS Policy Matrix conflicts with a runbook in a live incident, how do you resolve that?

sections.title: Future Improvements & Policy Alignment
sections.goal: Discuss forward-looking changes and alignment with company values
sample_questions: What improvements would you propose to RB-NET-029 to better support sustainable velocity?
How could we better integrate policy-as-code (RFC-903) into Poseidon's configuration management?
Which upcoming networking trends do you consider hype versus evidence-based, given our mission?
